name: Baby Piano Games
description:
Music activities for babies and children

Practice piano Through simple games, there are 20 levels / 20 songs.

Can play offline and Not have advertising at all.
No internet connection and No have social sharing.

Style games
Press the piano key to shoot ball the insect.
There will be music by the keys.
If you hit the beat, the music will be 3 stars.

Have fun with the game.
